answers.answer: Hi,Thanks for writing in.These symptoms can be due to anxiety and stress, peripheral neuropathy due to diabetes and B12 deficiency, nerve compression, and serious neurological disorders like MS.It is important to get a blood sugar test done to rule out diabetes.Please get yourself evaluated by your PCP. Meantime you can take OTC B complex supplements and see if they help.
thanks for your help re: numb face and arm. Marie A
Hi,It could also be a symptom of stroke. Please get yourself evaluated at your earliest.Thanks!

question: what could be causing numb face and arm?
title: numb face and arm?
